about_the_game:
dWARf is a local pvp multiplayer game in which you can take on your friends in five small arenas presenting very different challenges.

Customise your dWARf and launch quickly a game with your friends!

Make as many round trips as possible with your tankard to fill barrels with frothy yellow liquid, fight for the last slice of sausage at the tavern, chase ducks in an underground lake...

In short, be the first in a series of trials of jolly dwarves in search of their next king.

The game contains 5 arenas and each match is composed of 3 arenas.

Only one player can play with a keyboard and mouse, other players must have a controller.
